mapper.sql: ID, CODE, NAME,PROCUREMENT_ID, CATEGORY_ID, STANDARD_MODEL,CATEGORY_MIDDLE_ID,PRODUCT_CATEGORY_ID, PRODUCT_CATEGORY_LEVEL,CATEGORY_BIG_ID, QUALITY_TECHNICAL_STANDARD, REMARK, IS_DELETED, CREATER_ID, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT,STATUS,SMALL_POINTS_ID
mapper.select:
select FROM T_BSS_OB_PRODUCT WHERE 1=1 AND IS_DELETED=0
and CODE like '%'||#{code}||'%'
and NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%'
and STATUS = #{status}
ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC

select
from T_BSS_OB_PRODUCT where ID in(select PRODUCT_ID from T_BSS_OB_RESULTS_INFO where SUPPLIER_ID = ${supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select
from T_BSS_OB_PRODUCT where IS_DELETED = 0 order by CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.update: update T_BSS_OB_PRODUCT set IS_DELETED = 1 where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into T_BSS_OB_PRODUCT (ID, CODE, NAME, CATEGORY_MIDDLE_ID,PRODUCT_CATEGORY_ID,PRODUCT_CATEGORY_LEVEL, PROCUREMENT_ID, CATEGORY_BIG_ID, CATEGORY_ID, STANDARD_MODEL, QUALITY_TECHNICAL_STANDARD, REMARK, IS_DELETED, CREATER_ID, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryMiddleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{productCategoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{productCategoryLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{procurementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryBigId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{standardModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qualityTechnicalStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

select sys_guid() from dual

PRODUCT_CATEGORY_ID,
PRODUCT_CATEGORY_LEVEL,
SMALL_POINTS_ID,

#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{procurementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{categoryBigId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{smallPointsId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.select: select count(*) from T_BSS_OB_PRODUCT where id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update T_BSS_OB_PRODUCT
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCUREMENT_ID = #{record.procurementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CATEGORY_BIG_ID = #{record.categoryBigId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CATEGORY_ID = #{record.categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STANDARD_MODEL = #{record.standardModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUALITY_TECHNICAL_STANDARD = #{record.qualityTechnicalStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DELETED = #{record.isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATER_ID = #{record.createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{record.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{record.updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update T_BSS_OB_PRODUCT set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCUREMENT_ID = #{record.procurementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGORY_BIG_ID = #{record.categoryBigId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGORY_ID = #{record.categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STANDARD_MODEL = #{record.standardModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUALITY_TECHNICAL_STANDARD = #{record.qualityTechnicalStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DELETED = #{record.isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATER_ID = #{record.createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{record.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{record.updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update T_BSS_OB_PRODUCT
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCUREMENT_ID = #{procurementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CATEGORY_BIG_ID = #{categoryBigId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STANDARD_MODEL = #{standardModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUALITY_TECHNICAL_STANDARD = #{qualityTechnicalStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CATEGORY_MIDDLE_ID = #{categoryMiddleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_CATEGORY_ID = #{productCategoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_CATEGORY_LEVEL = #{productCategoryLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SMALL_POINTS_ID = #{smallPointsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_BSS_OB_PRODUCT set CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCUREMENT_ID = #{procurementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGORY_BIG_ID = #{categoryBigId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STANDARD_MODEL = #{standardModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUALITY_TECHNICAL_STANDARD = #{qualityTechnicalStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM T_SES_OMS_ORG WHERE SHORT_NAME = #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT DISTINCT SMALL_POINTS_ID FROM T_BSS_OB_PRODUCT WHERE IS_DELETED = 0 AND STATUS = 2 AND SMALL_POINTS_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY WHERE IS_PUBLISH = 0 AND IS_DELETED = 0
AND NAME LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' )

select DISTINCT PROCUREMENT_ID from T_BSS_OB_PRODUCT where SMALL_POINTS_ID = #{smallPointsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND IS_DELETED = 0
AND ID <> #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT
FROM T_BSS_OB_PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 2 AND IS_DELETED=0
AND CODE like '%'||#{code}||'%'
AND NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%'
AND SMALL_POINTS_ID = #{smallPointsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
